ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Weekend update...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... sea horse cave and see a re-spawn.  I target it, see that it is a named, and my jaw drops when I see that it s none other than Coralyn Kelpmaiden and she
ygData.messageBody:
> "Follow me! (famous last words)" I tell my group and we swim out of the
sea horse cave and see a re-spawn. I target it, see that it is a named, and
my jaw drops when I see that it's none other than Coralyn Kelpmaiden and she
is wielding the drum! Errm, the lute! No, the drum that only looks like a
lute! No, no, the lute that actually is a drum! It's all part of "The
Vision(tm)" or is it just part of "The Smell(tm)" ??? Anyhow, I screamed:
"KILL THIS NOW!!!!" And a few short moments later, looted the Sharkskin
Drum.

Wow, congrats! How does it look when equipped?

Reedwind
17th level bard

Underbrush
41st level ranger

Bertoxx
